name: Introduction to HTML
description: Basics of HTML structure, elements, and tags.

lessons.name: HTML Basics
lessons.description: Understanding HTML structure and the role of tags.

lessons.name: Forms and Inputs
lessons.description: Creating interactive forms in HTML.

lessons.name: HTML5 Semantics
lessons.description: Exploring the semantic elements introduced in HTML5.

name: Styling with CSS
description: Introduction to CSS for styling web pages.

lessons.name: CSS Selectors and Properties
lessons.description: Basics of selecting elements and applying styles.

lessons.name: Responsive Design
lessons.description: Techniques for creating responsive web designs.

lessons.name: Flexbox and Grid
lessons.description: Understanding the Flexbox and Grid layout systems in CSS.

name: Javascript and React
description: Exploring the fundamentals of JavaScript followed by an introduction to React for building interactive web applications.

lessons.name: JavaScript Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to JavaScript syntax, variables, data types, and control structures.

lessons.name: Advanced JavaScript
lessons.description: Diving deeper into JavaScript with functions, scope, closures, and asynchronous programming.

lessons.name: Getting Started with React
lessons.description: Introduction to React concepts, creating components, state management, and props.

name: Android Fundamentals
description: Basics of Android app development.

lessons.name: Android Studio and Setup
lessons.description: Setting up the development environment for Android.

lessons.name: Activity Lifecycle
lessons.description: Understanding the Android activity lifecycle.

lessons.name: UI Design with XML
lessons.description: Designing user interfaces in Android using XML.

name: Mobile User Interface Design
description: Principles of designing user interfaces for mobile apps.

lessons.name: UI Components
lessons.description: Using Android UI components to build interfaces.

lessons.name: Material Design
lessons.description: Implementing Material Design principles in Android apps.

lessons.name: Navigation and User Flow
lessons.description: Designing and implementing navigation patterns for optimal user flow.

name: Advanced Android Features
description: Exploring advanced features in Android development for sophisticated applications.

lessons.name: Background Processing
lessons.description: Implementing background tasks using WorkManager and services.

lessons.name: Notifications
lessons.description: Designing and managing notifications for user engagement.

lessons.name: Data Persistence
lessons.description: Storing data locally with Room database and SharedPreferences.

name: Robotics Fundamentals
description: Introduction to the core concepts and technologies in robotics.

lessons.name: Introduction to Robotics
lessons.description: Overview of robotics history, types of robots, and their applications.

lessons.name: Sensors and Actuators
lessons.description: Exploring various sensors and actuators used in robotics for perception and movement.

lessons.name: Robot Kinematics
lessons.description: Understanding the mathematical foundation for robot movement and positioning.

name: Robot Control Systems
description: Techniques for controlling robot actions and decision making.

lessons.name: Control Theory Basics
lessons.description: Fundamental principles of control theory in robotics.

lessons.name: PID Controllers
lessons.description: Implementing Proportional-Integral-Derivative (PID) controllers for stable robot control.

lessons.name: Motion Planning
lessons.description: Strategies for planning robot paths and movements in complex environments.

name: Robotics Software Development
description: Developing software for robots using ROS (Robot Operating System) and simulation tools.

lessons.name: Introduction to ROS
lessons.description: Getting started with ROS, its architecture, and tools for developing robotic applications.

lessons.name: Robot Simulation
lessons.description: Using Gazebo and other simulation tools for testing and development.

lessons.name: ROS Navigation Stack
lessons.description: Implementing autonomous navigation in robots using the ROS navigation stack.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Basic concepts and techniques in algorithm design and analysis.

lessons.name: Algorithm Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to the concept of algorithms, complexity, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Sorting and Searching
lessons.description: Exploring fundamental sorting and searching algorithms.

lessons.name: Divide and Conquer
lessons.description: Solving problems using divide and conquer strategy, including mergesort and quicksort.

name: Data Structures
description: Understanding the role of data structures in algorithm design.

lessons.name: Basic Data Structures
lessons.description: Introduction to stacks, queues, linked lists, and trees.

lessons.name: Graph Algorithms
lessons.description: Exploring graph representations, traversal algorithms, and shortest path problems.

lessons.name: Hash Tables
lessons.description: Understanding hash tables and their applications in efficient data retrieval.

name: Advanced Algorithms
description: Studying more complex algorithms and their applications.

lessons.name: Dynamic Programming
lessons.description: Solving optimization problems using dynamic programming techniques.

lessons.name: Greedy Algorithms
lessons.description: Understanding greedy algorithms and their use in solving optimization problems.

lessons.name: NP-Completeness
lessons.description: Introduction to NP-complete problems and approaches to solving them.

name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: Foundational concepts in AI, including history and applications.

lessons.name: History of AI
lessons.description: Exploring the evolution of AI from its inception to the current state.

lessons.name: Problem Solving and Search
lessons.description: Introduction to problem-solving strategies and search algorithms in AI.

lessons.name: Knowledge Representation
lessons.description: Understanding how knowledge can be represented and used in AI systems.

name: Machine Learning Foundations
description: Basic principles and algorithms in machine learning.

lessons.name: Supervised Learning
lessons.description: Exploring the concepts of supervised learning and common algorithms.

lessons.name: Unsupervised Learning
lessons.description: Introduction to unsupervised learning techniques and their applications.

lessons.name: Neural Networks
lessons.description: Basics of neural networks and deep learning.

name: AI in Practice
description: Exploring practical applications of AI across various domains.

lessons.name: Natural Language Processing
lessons.description: Introduction to NLP and its use in understanding human language.

lessons.name: Computer Vision
lessons.description: Understanding how computers can be made to gain high-level understanding from digital images or videos.

lessons.name: Robotics and AI
lessons.description: Exploring the integration of AI in robotics for autonomous systems.

name: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Overview of machine learning concepts, types, and algorithms.

lessons.name: Machine Learning Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to the core concepts and types of machine learning: supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.

lessons.name: Linear Regression
lessons.description: Exploring linear regression, a fundamental algorithm for supervised learning.

lessons.name: Classification Algorithms
lessons.description: Understanding classification algorithms and their applications.

name: Deep Learning
description: Diving into deep learning frameworks, neural networks, and their applications.

lessons.name: Introduction to Neural Networks
lessons.description: Basics of neural networks and how they mimic the human brain.

lessons.name: Convolutional Neural Networks
lessons.description: Exploring CNNs and their significance in image recognition and processing.

lessons.name: Recurrent Neural Networks
lessons.description: Understanding RNNs and their application in sequence prediction problems.

name: Special Topics in Machine Learning
description: Exploring advanced topics and recent trends in machine learning.

lessons.name: Natural Language Processing with ML
lessons.description: Applying machine learning models to understand and process human languages.

lessons.name: Generative Adversarial Networks
lessons.description: Introduction to GANs and their use in generating new data instances.

lessons.name: Reinforcement Learning
lessons.description: Studying the principles of reinforcement learning and its applications.

name: Introduction to Large Language Models
description: Understanding the fundamentals and applications of large language models.

lessons.name: Fundamentals of LLMs
lessons.description: Overview of what large language models are and their significance in AI.

lessons.name: Architecture of LLMs
lessons.description: Exploring the architecture and components of large language models such as Transformer models.

lessons.name: Training Large Language Models
lessons.description: Understanding the process, challenges, and computational requirements in training LLMs.

name: Applications of Large Language Models
description: Exploring various applications and implications of large language models in technology and society.

lessons.name: Natural Language Understanding
lessons.description: Using LLMs for understanding and processing natural language at scale.

lessons.name: Content Generation
lessons.description: Generating text, code, and other content with LLMs.

lessons.name: Ethical Considerations
lessons.description: Discussing the ethical implications and biases of LLMs.

name: Advanced Topics in LLMs
description: Diving deeper into the cutting-edge research and future directions of large language models.

lessons.name: Improving Efficiency in LLMs
lessons.description: Techniques and innovations for making LLMs more efficient and accessible.

lessons.name: Multimodal Large Language Models
lessons.description: Exploring LLMs that understand and generate not just text but also images, audio, and more.

lessons.name: LLMs and Societal Impact
lessons.description: Analyzing the broader impacts of LLMs on society, culture, and the future of work.
